entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
